name: Biogas Norr
goal:
Biogas Norr is a network for biogas stakeholders in the 4 northern counties in Sweden, 50% of the Swedish area. The work is performed within BioFuel Region AB.

We want to increase production and value of biogas in northern Sweden to reach a sustainable low carbon economy.

The network faces challenges by co-operation to reach change.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
UN sustainable development goals
Paris Agreement
EU 2020, 2050 Energy Strategy, Energy roadmap
CEF/H2020
Directive on Alternative Fuels
Renewable Energy Directive
Clean Mobility Package
